item.title: Breezy - Ivory [genre?]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
heyyyy das pretty gud. For a first track that’s really good. The melodies and layers really meshed together well.

But,

I do feel that there’s a lack of bass in the track, especially in the drop. It just sounds like all the low end in the track is just the kick. Some kind of 808 for the drop and a bass + sub for the rest would make this sound really nice because it’s got a lot more high end (almost sounds like you did some external compression?)

Read full topic
